Class SwingUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • at.jku.amp.lepatriinu.ui.SwingUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class SwingUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    A GUI for the execution of the Runner. It just provides some clickable interface to start off the analysis. Therefore we had to change the System.exit(1); parts into throw IllegalArgumentExceptions.

    System.out and System.err will be redirected to text panes in the window.

    Tip: Best to use the WindowBuilder plugin from Google, as the GridBagLayout produces really nasty code but has far the best effects on the layout.
    Author:
    Wolfgang KÃ¼llinger (0955711), Fabian Jordan (0855941)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
